Section.Catchline: Modification or termination of trust; proceedings for disapproval of nonjudicial acts.

Subsection.Text: In addition to the methods of termination prescribed by ss. 736.04113-736.0414, a trust terminates to the extent the trust expires or is revoked or is properly distributed pursuant to the terms of the trust.
A proceeding to disapprove a proposed modification or termination under s. 736.0412 or a trust combination or division under s. 736.0417 may be commenced by any beneficiary.
A proceeding to disapprove a proposed termination under s. 736.0414(1) may be commenced by any qualified beneficiary.
